remarks: A component of a natural transformation is a morphism.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.)
statement:
natrcl.1 $e |- N = ( C Nat D ) $.
natixp.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( <. F , G >. N <. K , L >. ) ) $.
natixp.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
natixp.j $e |- J = ( Hom ` D ) $.
natcl.1 $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
natcl $p |- ( ph -> ( A ` X ) e. ( ( F ` X ) J ( K ` X ) ) ) $.
